biography.bio: László Gálffi was born on November 16, 1952 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor, known for Colonel Redl (1985), Szenvedély (1998) and Men in the Nude (2006).
biography.name: László Gálffi

biography.bio: Éva Vándor was born on December 8, 1953 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for For Better or Worse (2005), Made in Hungaria (2009) and Patika (1994). She is married to Imre Harmath. They have one child.
biography.name: Éva Vándor

biography.bio: Erzsi Pártos was born on April 2, 1907 in Budapest, Hungary as Pollák Erzsébet. She was an actress, known for Frakk, a macskák réme (1972), Goose Boy (1950) and Johnny Corncob (1973). She died on April 18, 2000 in Budapest.
biography.name: Erzsi Pártos

biography.bio: Dezsõ Füller is an actor, known for The Kangaroo (1976), Il est dangereux de se pencher au dehors (1978) and Angi Vera (1979).
biography.name: Dezsõ Füller

biography.bio: Róbert Koltai was born on December 16, 1943 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor and director, known for Nous ne mourrons jamais (1993), A miniszter félrelép (1997) and The Stationmaster Meets His Match (1980). He has been married to Judit Pogány since August 7, 1971. They have one child.
biography.name: Róbert Koltai

biography.bio: János Csapó was born on January 2, 1924 in Tóalmás, Hungary. He was an actor, known for The Kangaroo (1976), Imre (1979) and A Nice Neighbor (1979). He died on November 25, 2015 in Hungary.
biography.name: János Csapó

biography.bio: Georgiana Tarjan was born on November 12, 1957 in Budapest, Hungary as Gyorgyi Kinga Paulina Tarjan. She is known for her work on Allegro barbaro (1979), Ki beszél itt szerelemröl (1980) and The Magpie in the Wisp (1983).
biography.name: Georgiana Tarjan

biography.bio: Péter Trokán was born on July 4, 1946 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor, known for Szomszédok (1987), A Hungarian Fairy Tale (1987) and Kegyenc (1983).
biography.name: Péter Trokán

biography.bio: Nóra Németh was born on March 26, 1955. She is an actress, known for Az eröd (1979), The Kangaroo (1976) and Asszonyok (1981).
biography.name: Nóra Németh

biography.bio: Péter Bregyán was born on May 22, 1954 in Kiskunfélegyháza, Hungary. He is an actor, known for P.S.O: In the Name of My Father (2017), The Kangaroo (1976) and Sing (2016).
biography.name: Péter Bregyán

biography.bio: Zsuzsa Málnai was born on September 24, 1953 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for Loop (2016), Rasputin (1996) and A dicsekvö varga (1979).
biography.name: Zsuzsa Málnai

biography.bio: Ágnes Bánfalvy was born on April 30, 1954 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for Eragon (2006), An American Rhapsody (2001) and Mephisto (1981).
biography.name: Ágnes Bánfalvy

biography.bio: János Bácskai was born on November 27, 1954 in Szentes, Hungary. He is an actor, known for Party (1977), Nem zárjuk kulcsra az ajtót (1983) and A Fox's Tale (2008).
biography.name: János Bácskai

biography.bio: Kata Kánya was born on August 11, 1953 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for Fahrschule (1986), Reggelire legjobb a puliszka (1983) and Une nuit de folie (1970). She was previously married to István Verebes and György Wossala.
biography.name: Kata Kánya

biography.bio: István Nagyidai was born on June 29, 1953 in Kosice, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for The Kangaroo (1976), A zöld torony (1985) and A löcsei fehér asszony (1976).
biography.name: István Nagyidai
